name: Tanaka's magical business
description:
Osaka magical girl, Sayori Tanaka, must stop monsters that suddenly appeared in the streets. An adventure in the vein of JRPGs from the 90's.

For MS-DOS, written in Assembly and C in the course of two months, currently in development. Submission for MS-DOS game jam #2.

At the beginning the idea was to do some silly, humorous and simple, but I ended loving the premise and aiming make a more complex game. So, there are bugs and incomplete features that I promise to resolve, is going to be a year full of updates.

Oh!, and any issue report (English typos) or help is more that welcomed. Have fun!.

Requirements
  • CPU: i386DX at 33 MHz or compatible
  • RAM: 576 KiB of conventional memory
  • VGA compatible video card
  • 2 MiB of hard disk space
  • MS-DOS 3.20 or compatible

Or an emulator like Dosbox!.

Contact
  • You can found me in Mastodon.social@baAlex
  • Or my blog, The Alpaca Jumps
